headline: A Look At Ameren (AEE) Valuation As Recent Returns Show Cooling Momentum
summary: Ameren’s recent performance snapshot Ameren (AEE) has seen mixed share performance, with a 0.6% decline over the past day, a 1.6% decline over the past week, and a 2.5% gain over the past month. Over longer periods, the stock shows a 1.9% decline over the past 3 months, a 1.4% gain year to date, and an 11.9% total return over the past year, alongside 3-year and 5-year total returns of 28.9% and 62.9% respectively.
